creditline: Gift of funds from Marla J. Kinney
description: grassy mound with sloping green hill, with six headstones dispersed across hill; large tree with low-hanging branches at top of mound; lush green leaves with red shading; group of three figures wearing hats, rendered in purple pigments, at R, on back side of hill
medium: Color woodcut with relief printing from zinc plates
provenance: Sale, Grant Zahajko Auctions, Davenport, Wash., no. 85, December 10, 2020; sold to Carl; [William P. Carl, Durham, N.C., 2020–21]
signed: LLC of image, in gray pigment: W. Giles | LRC, margin, in pencil: W. Giles
title: The Graveyard
